entry.summary:
Observed at: Powell River Airport 7:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain

Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 4.8°C

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h except 70 over exposed coastal sections this morning and early this afternoon. Temperature steady near 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h except 70 over exposed coastal sections overnight. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h except 80 over exposed coastal sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
